entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
